channel.title: Adding custom trouble, wont show wielding?
channel.description:
i have followed several guides and i have been able to add the model and the ints to the class8.
i then was able to go on and type add models and it worked.
im able to see the weapon in the inventory and when i drop it on the ground but when i equip it it shows up as a scroll under my feet
it is in the weapon slot so im not sure why its not working
im on prodigyscape client and im trying to add the fallen angel for those who know of it.
what is wrong? any help is much appreciated[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2009, 07:42:29 pm[/size][hr]oops wrong place sorry
